transcript:
Customer: Prabhu Nandan Raghav Ram Hare.

Hello.

Hello.
Executive: Ha Lokesh ji Namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar boliye.
Executive: Ha sir ha sir. Sir aapne jo kaha tha na uske regarding maine jo invoice aapne jo manga tha uske regarding sir maine dal rakha hai. Baki sir aapne customer care pe call kiya tha to
Customer: Bataye. Kuch matlab concern tha ya kya kisi cheez ko lekar ke bataye.
Customer: Main pehle to price bhi usi ke liye kiya tha. Bola ye kya invoice vagera mil jaye nahi to humko to kya hai na usme fir charge lag jata hai na.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Byaaj padana padta hai.
Executive: Uske regarding sir pehle hi maine apna jo hai wo team ko bata rakha hai. Jaise hi wo hoga sir main definitely us cheez ko bataunga hi bataunga.
Customer: Achcha aur ek cheez aur tha ek concern dusra.
Executive: Ha ha bataiye sir.
Customer: Jaise jo apni by lead jaise apne ko bhi 70 by lead dete hain weekly aur 300 bonus dete hain per day ka.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Hai na kuch plan hai uske hisab se.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: To jaise isko abhi badhana ho to iske liye kya upay hai?
Executive: Ye leads ko badhana ho to uska kya upay hai? 70 ko man lo 100 karna ho ya 100 150 ya kuch aisa karna ho man lo.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: To kaise kar sakte hain matlab ki wo to jo usme dikhata hai wo to 300 rupaye 400 rupaye se batata hai per lead ka. To wo to bahut jyada hai.
Executive: Are aap ek ek ek ek rupaye kyu kharch karoge sir itna ek ek karke. Wo to bahut jyada bada hisab baith jayega aur aapka by lead ka consumption mujhe pata hai aapka by lead ka consumption jyada hai.
Customer: Aur abhi kya hai na catalog view vagera badha hua hai na mera to isliye thoda sa mere ko abhi matlab aisa lag raha hai by lead kam pad sakti hai kyuki
Executive: Pad rahi hai sir. Pad sakte nahi hai pad rahi hai. Aap ye maniye.
Customer: Isi week me isi week ka bhi aap dekhoge na jaise to abhi dekho aap mera aaj Monday hai.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Aur catalog view vagera ka jaise purchase kiya to uske baad abhi khatam ho gaya lagbhag ab matlab aadha 50% ke aas pass consume hone ko aa gaya hai.
Executive: To main to keh hi raha hu sir wo khatam ho hi jayega aapka. By leads vagera to kam kam kam pad hi rahi hai aapko.
Customer: Ye hai ki isse
Executive: Apun jaise kya kar sakte hain kyuki ye to bada samasya wala kam ho raha hai na. Fir wo catalog view aayega bhi to uske fir hum matlab koi fayda nahi milega na usse.
Executive: Wahi to main nahi main wahi to keh raha hu sir jab aapke pass lead aapke pass hoga hi nahi consumption karne ke liye wo quantity hi nahi hogi to aap karoge kaise. Seedhi si baat hai aur by lead ka consumption dekhte hui maine aapko suggest ki thi do cheeze aur wo uska procedure wahi hai sir aapko upgrade karna padega plan ko.
Executive: Ab wo karenge sir to main aapko assure karta hu achcha hoga hi hoga.
Customer: Are ek bar yakin to karo. Ye batao mere ko jaise aap nahi samajh rahe aap dekho please practically aap usko chalo na aapne man lo preferred leader wala diya.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Hamari visibility badh jayegi.
Executive: Bilkul. Ha yahi iska effect aayega ki bhai visibility badhegi.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Jab visibility badhegi to visibility jab badhegi to usme kya hoga fir wo?
Customer: Wo apne ko waha par catalog view badh jayega.
Executive: Ha catalog view badh jayega call sir inquiry badh jayega by leads number of by leads aapko jyada milenge.
Customer: Kya kaha jyada milti hai usme?
Executive: Kyu number of by leads badhenge aapko particular jo category me aap preferred leader.
Customer: 70 milti hai.
Executive: Preferred leader.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir jaise agar preferred leader aap loge na to aapko us particular category ki by leads to alag hi milegi na.
Customer: Wo to badh kar hi milenge aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi by lead aap pata kar lena utni hi milti hai usme.
Executive: Sir agar agar jaise man lo aap abhi jo hamara leader chal raha hai theek hai hamara hamara jo leader leader chal raha hai aur agar main aapko batau agar aap particular ek category me bhi main aapko batau ek second rukna bata raha hu.
Executive: Agar aap particular category me
Customer: Line pe rahiye line pe rahiye line.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants invoice to avoid extra charges.

- Wants to increase the number of buyleads.

- Current buyleads are insufficient due to increased catalog views.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to inform once invoice is ready.

- Suggested upgrading the plan to increase buyleads.

- Explained benefits of preferred leader plan.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide category specific buylead details.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- invoice, buyleads, catalog view, plan upgrade
